title: Camping equipment sales in the U.S. - sleeping bags 2011
yAxis: Equipment sales in million U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic shows a growth forecast for the U.S. equipment sales in 2011 and shows the actual projected Equipment value of the equipment sales in 2010 .
For 2011 , the U.S. smart equipment sales is forecasted to reach 210.38 million U.S. dollars .
The predicted compound annual growth rate between 2010 and 2011 should be 26.3 million .
